title: This SFB is offering 7.5% RD interest rate on 2-year recurring deposits - Mint
content: This SFB is offering 7.5% RD interest rate on 2-year recurring deposits  Mint
description: One can open RD account at this small finance bank for 3 months, 6 months, 9 months, one year, two years, three years, 4 years, 5 years and more than 5 years to 10 years
